d1e10.d: Southwest Virginia's Rocky Horror Picture Show shadowcast, with semesterly shows in Haymarket Theatre.

d1e17.t: Virginia Tech Performing Arts Shows that are Worth It to Attend
d1e17.d: Evvy's guide to recurring shows put on at Virginia Tech that you should attend next time you're in the area.

d1e31.d: A semesterly sketch comedy show, produced entirely by undergrad students, held in various performance venues.

d1e39.d: Virginia Tech's symphony orchestra, putting on several shows each semester in the Moss Arts Center.
